powers.name: Ice Saber
powers.description: Launches ice spikes that will damage everything on touch.

powers.name: Ice Ball
powers.description: Creates a ball of hard ice around the mob/player the user is looking.

powers.name: Ice Age
powers.description: Creates a long ice road in water. Useful when travelling on ocean.

powers.name: Ice Block
powers.description: Creates an Ice Pheasant which moves forwards freezing and damaging everything it touches.
